message_1: What is the SHA-256 cryptographic hash of the message "Hello, world!"?
message_2:
To compute the SHA-256 cryptographic hash of the message "Hello, world!", you can use a programming language or an online tool. Here's the Python code to do it:

```python
import hashlib

message = "Hello, world!"
hash_object = hashlib.sha256(message.encode())
hash_hex = hash_object.hexdigest()

print(hash_hex)
```

The SHA-256 hash of the message "Hello, world!" is:
`315f5bdb76d078c43b8ac0064e4a0164612b1fce77c869345bfc94c75894edd3`
